mapper.insert:
insert into daletou_his_list( daletou_id, daletou_no, open_date, week_date, front_one, front_sec, front_third, front_four, front_five, back_one, back_sec, in_all_money, first_num, first_money, sec_num, sec_money, all_money ) values
( #{daletou.daletou_id}, #{daletou.daletou_no}, #{daletou.open_date}, #{daletou.week_date}, #{daletou.front_one}, #{daletou.front_sec}, #{daletou.front_third}, #{daletou.front_four}, #{daletou.front_five}, #{daletou.back_one}, #{daletou.back_sec}, #{daletou.in_all_money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{daletou.first_num}, #{daletou.first_money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{daletou.sec_num}, #{daletou.sec_money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{daletou.all_money} )
